category-def.name: Anyframe Java IDE
category-def.label: Anyframe Java IDE
category-def.description: [Warning] If Anyframe plugins are already installed in dropins or addins folder, please remove the Anyframe plugins. Code Generator Plug-in requires m2eclipse Plugin(http://m2eclipse.sonatype.org/sites/m2e), m2eclipse-extra Plugin(http://m2eclipse.sonatype.org/sites/m2e-extra).
